definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but

sentences.english: that it's okay to not do great in studio, but you can still succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在工作室學習不太好不要緊，你依然能成功。

sentences.english: 'You're mistaken I daresay. It's no matter.
sentences.chinese: 我想是你弄錯了，這不要緊。

sentences.english: Determination is the most important thing for the reader.
sentences.chinese: 立志是讀書人最要緊的一件事。

sentences.english: We're southern, so family loyalty's really big down there.
sentences.chinese: 我們南方人嘛，家族的忠實度很要緊的。

sentences.english: Impartiality is absolutely essential to a judge.
sentences.chinese: 法官最要緊的是公正無私。

sentences.english: These five precepts are the most important rules in our lives. Therefore, everyone should uphold the five precepts.
sentences.chinese: 這五戒是人生最要緊的規律，人人都應該守五戒。

sentences.english: While it's true that the big things matter, the little things do too.
sentences.chinese: 大事兒要緊這沒錯，但小事兒同樣的。

sentences.english: Shouted the old black females was such a big deal, the front of the neighbors were awakened.
sentences.chinese: 老黑母兔這麼一喊不要緊，把跟前的鄰居們都驚醒了。

sentences.english: We need to put these problems aside for now and get the work done.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須把這些問問先放放，把事情做好要緊。

sentences.english: It matters everywhere, at every stage of your life.
sentences.chinese: 在你生命中的每個階段都十分要緊。

sentences.english: But it's importa goodt a goodd urgent. Pleautomotive service engineers make sure he gets this message.
sentences.chinese: 不過這件事很要緊，請一定將留言傳達給他。

sentences.english: Nover mind, you'll soon feel better.
sentences.chinese: 不要緊的，你立刻會好的。

sentences.english: As the most important painting is of pedantic, but the foundation is still the most important thing.
sentences.chinese: 作畫自然是書卷氣爲重，但是根基還是最要緊的。

sentences.english: It doesn't matter. A big calculator, you know, I am holding you on your honor.
sentences.chinese: 不要緊，一個大的計算器，我充分地信任你們。

sentences.english: Ensure hem stich is neat and straight and stitch tension not tight.
sentences.chinese: 確保腳車線整齊和直及線步不要緊。

sentences.english: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.
sentences.chinese: 然而我在肉身活着，爲你們更是要緊的。

to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
